Name: [center]Adalbert[/center]
Text: [center]Your Mom sent you huh? So you need some Wine? For your Grandma yes?[/center]

Name: [center]Adalbert[/center]
Text: [center]Yes I will do that since it is my Job.[/center]

Name: [center]Adalbert[/center]
Text: [center]I need some Grapes from the Vineyard..go fetch them girl.[/center]
